content.question: All of the following were major goals of the European feminist movement of the late 1960' s and 1970' s EXCEPT

choices.label: better and more affordable child-care facilities
suffrage for women over the age of 21
reform of civil legislation on marriage and divorce
improved access to birth control information and technology

content.answer: suffrage for women over the age of 21

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
